scripts.dev: dotenv -- turbo run dev --filter=$(dotenv -- printenv PROJECT_NAME || echo web)...
scripts.build: dotenv -- turbo run build --filter=$(dotenv -- printenv PROJECT_NAME || echo web)...
scripts.clean: yarn cache clean --all && [ -d "node_modules" ] && turbo run clean && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.start: dotenv -- turbo run start --filter=$(dotenv -- printenv PROJECT_NAME || echo web)...
scripts.check-types: dotenv -- turbo run check-types --filter=$(dotenv -- printenv PROJECT_NAME || echo web)...
scripts.lint: dotenv -- turbo run lint --filter=$(dotenv -- printenv PROJECT_NAME || echo web)...
scripts.test: dotenv -- turbo run test --filter=$(dotenv -- printenv PROJECT_NAME || echo web)...
